message.entry: Value must be of type {0} or be convertible to {0}.

entry.note: 0 is a list of strings seprated by new lines
0 is a string;translate=false set due no translatable content
0 is a list of enum members;translate=false set due no translatable content
0 is the name of an enum class

message.entry: See the list of valid options.

entry.note: 0 is the name of an enum class

message.entry: To see the list of valid options, type enumeration(''{0}'').

entry.note: 0 is a scalar text value, 1 is a list of enum members

message.entry: ''{0}'' is not a valid value. See the list of valid options.

message.entry: ''{0}'' is not a valid value. To see the list of valid options, type enumeration(''{1}'').

entry.note: 0 is scalar text value, 1 is a list of enum members
0 is preamble, e.g. Invalid input argument at position 10.

message.entry: Value must be a vector with {0} elements.
Value must be a matrix with {0} rows.
Value must be a matrix with {0} columns.
Value must be a matrix of size {0}.
Value must be an array of size {0} where * indicates a dimension of any size.
